item.title: Virginia Private Custom Wine Tour from Charlottesville
item.description: With the beauty of the Blue Ridge Mountains surrounding the quaint vineyards of Virginia, this private wine excursion delivers a peaceful and harmonious experience in the great outdoors. A private chauffeur will cruise you and your guests from historic Charlottesville to the countryside. Spend the day touring the area and sampling wines from multiple wineries. On the Wine Trail, you’ll have your choice of which tasting rooms to visit and when to have a picnic lunch.

image.alt: Virginia Private Custom Wine Tour from Charlottesville

item.title: Shenandoah National Park Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour
item.description: This self-guided tour is a perfect alternative to full-day group tours for independent travelers. Benefit from the freedom of being able to set your own pace, decide the start time, and ride around the highlights of Shenandoah National Park in your own car. After downloading an app, listen to audio as you drive and learn secrets about Shenandoah’s history and its most impressive landmarks.

image.alt: Shenandoah National Park Self-Guided Driving Audio Tour

item.title: Private Wine Tours (Minimum 3 & Maximum 6 ) Pickup Maximum 30 Mi
item.description: Discover Virginia’s Monticello Wine Trail on a private winery tour in Charlottesville. Create an itinerary with your dedicated guide based on your group’s wine interests and travel in a comfortable vehicle to each destination. Enjoy guided tours of each vineyard, play indoor games, and purchase wine tastings, if you’d like.

image.alt: Private Wine Tours (Minimum 3 & Maximum 6 ) Pickup Maximum 30 Mi

item.title: Custom Wine Tour In Black Suburban With Panoramic Sunroof
item.description: When you book a tour with, you get the leading tour provided within the the Monticello Wine Trail Region. Depending on group size, day of the week, our group can help get you access to some of the best tables at vineyards, guide you on dining options, and talk you through the history and landmarks of the area.

image.alt: Custom Wine Tour In Black Suburban With Panoramic Sunroof

item.title: Private Charlottesville Area Wine Tour
item.description: A day spent in wine country is a must for any trip to the Charlottesville area, but choosing which wineries to visit can be difficult if you're not familiar with them. Take pleasure in a personalized, five-hour wine tour of the Monticello Wine Region in a more intimate setting. Choose the vineyards you like best, visit lesser-known locations, or let us recommend stops that fit your interests.

item.title: The UVA Corner Food Tour: Private Walking Food Tour in Charlottesville
item.description: Charlottesville is known for being the former estate of Thomas Jefferson and home to the prestigious University of Virginia, also designed by the former president. Take a walking tour of the town’s most famous eateries that are beloved by both locals and students on this private walking tour. Enjoy small plates at each stop and learn about the history of the town from your guide.

image.alt: The UVA Corner Food Tour: Private Walking Food Tour in Charlottesville

item.title: Wine and Culinary Delight Private Tour
item.description: If you want to overload your senses, this could be the one. This tour combines two of the area's top vineyards, which not only produce wonderful wine but also provide an unforgettable culinary experience. One of the stops is also recognized for its architectural design, while the other for its architectural ruins.

image.alt: Wine and Culinary Delight Private Tour

item.title: Charlottesville Dark History Ghost Tour
item.description:
Charlottesville has experienced its fair share of turmoil and tragedy, alongside its charming streets and delectable cuisine. From the legend of the enigmatic Moon Ghost who terrorized a local family to the brooding figure of James Madison reported at his beloved Montpelier, the Charlottesville area has been haunted by the shadow of death and destruction for centuries. A bone-chilling stroll at night exposes the enduring existence of the city’s distressing past.
This spine-tingling ghost tour will take you to some of the most haunted spots in the city. From the former home of a murdering husband to chilling experiences at a local park, you will delve into the shadows of Charlottesville's murky history.
This is a walking tour. We do not ever the private homes or businesses. The duration of the tour is outside and the total tour time is account for us walking from spot to spot.

item.title: The Downtown Mall Food Tour
item.description: The Downtown Mall Food Tour is a unique and memorable way to visit one of America's top college towns.

item.title: Private Arrival Transfer from Charlotteville Airport (CHO)
item.description: Make your arrival to Charlottesville International Airport (CHO) a seamless one when you pre-book this private transfer service. After collecting your luggage, meet your driver, who is holding a nameplate, and head to your vehicle. Then, enjoy a swift and comfortable ride to your destination located anywhere in the Charlottesville area.

image.alt: Private Arrival Transfer from Charlotteville Airport (CHO)

item.title: 5 Hour Historic Thomas Jefferson Wine Tour
item.description: We would like to personally invite you to travel with us across the beautiful countryside of Charlottesville and the surrounding area. Through tastings of some of Virginia's finest wines, you will be fully submerged in the rich history of Jefferson's influence on the region.

image.alt: 5 Hour Historic Thomas Jefferson Wine Tour

item.title: Charlottesville Challenge Scavenger Hunt
item.description:
Our very unique, immersive adventures are the only ones of their kind. We, unlike other companies, provide your very own remote, interactive, live host to assist and encourage you along through your phone. We are an Austin, TX-based global custom event design company offering scavenger hunts and other events in 300+ cities in North America and beyond. Our specially hand-crafted adventures are equal parts tour, creative challenge, detective hunt, and social experiment!
Guests get to discover in an alternate reality our favorite hidden gems off the beaten trail and creatively interpret fun art, history, and culture clues - for points! They get to enjoy fame and glory while appearing on our website’s international leaderboard, no matter what their score. They get to essentially race other teams in other cities, even if they don’t have competitors who have signed up in their city that day. Get ready to discover unusual oddities, laugh out loud, and make the experience your own!

item.title: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Centuries of Charlottesville
item.description: Have a blast exploring Charlottesville with this app-led scavenger hunt, titled Centuries of Charlottesville. You’ll get to see the most entertaining sights in town, while learning about its history and culture, but you’ll have to answer trivia questions and solve challenges to unlock each new prompt. Enjoy this with a group of 10 or fewer people.

image.alt: Self-Guided Scavenger Hunt: Centuries of Charlottesville

item.title: Charlottesville: Best Vineyards Private Tour (Up to 14 people)
item.description: With scenic, gently sloping hills leading to one winery after the next—not to mention historic attractions, lavish accommodations, and fine food—Charlottesville, Virginia, is the ideal destination for those seeking a wine-centric experience. Nestled between Richmond and Washington, D.C., it’s a perfect road trip destination for East Coasters looking for an easy and fun adventure (or anyone looking to take in Virginia’s gorgeous forests and scenery). These five wineries in the Charlottesville region offer exceptional wines, along with vibrant character and rich history.

image.alt: Charlottesville: Best Vineyards Private Tour (Up to 14 people)

item.title: The Dairy Market Food Tour
item.description: The Dairy Market is among Charlottesville's leading food, retail, and entertainment venues. Free parking is available onsite.

item.title: Private Departure Transfer to Charlottesville Airport (CHO)
item.description: Depart Charlottesville stress-free with this private departure transfer directly to Charlottesville Airport (CHO). You don’t need to wait in lines for taxis or shuttle buses, or share your ride with strangers. Instead, easily find your driver at the departure point, then relax in your vehicle on the way to the airport, arriving in plenty of time for your flight.

image.alt: Private Departure Transfer to Charlottesville Airport (CHO)

item.title: Boar's Head Resort Off Road Jeep Tour
item.description:
Leaving from Boar's Head Resort adventure into the George Washington National Forest to Bald Mountain Jeep Trail.
The Trail adventures are off-road, the duration is approximately 4-6 hours, with a peak elevation of 4000+ ft above sea level. 4x4 is the only way to access these breathtaking locations, as the trails are steep and challenging year-round. This is for the truly adventurous; those who seek challenges and crave excitement.
Jeep includes a Refrigerator, Camp Kitchen, Skottle, Awning, Camp Chairs, and even a toilet. Everything you need to have an enjoyable day in the George Washington National Forest is included. Bring your lunch, beverages and we will stop to eat.

image.alt: Boar's Head Resort Off Road Jeep Tour

item.title: Family Excursion
item.description: Take the stress out of your family excursion in Charlottesville with this private round-trip transfer from Pantops Shopping Center to the destination of your choice. Skip the guesswork of ride-sharing services or taxis and schedule your pickup in advance, then head straight to your excursion location—including wineries, sights, parks, concerts, or other destinations. Enjoy a few hours of free time to enjoy your family activity before the return trip to the pick-up location or other drop-off point.

item.title: Private UNESCO World Heritage Tour
item.description: This tour will take us to two of Thomas Jefferson's most notable achievements. Starts with an hour-long historic guided tour of the University's Academical Village, Rotunda, and gardens by UVA staff. We then make our way to Monticello's visitor center, where you can grab a bite to eat at the Monticello Farm Table, which serves local, sustainable, farm-to-table food. You will then be shuttled up the mountain to Monticello, where you will enjoy the Highlights tour. This 45-minute guided tour by Monticello staff takes you through the first floor of Thomas Jefferson's residence, as well as the West Lawn and South Wing. This popular pass provides entry to the gardens, grounds, walking tours, family activities, and exhibits. If time allows, we'll stop at Jefferson Vineyards for a tasting before ending the tour.
